subject: Relationships
title: Work Friends: Real or Circumstantial?
description: One-minute skill: Work Friends: Real or Circumstantial?.

hook.text: You spend more time with your coworkers than your family. But would you see them if you quit?

buildup.text: Gallup found that having a best friend at work increases engagement by 7x. Work friends boost productivity.

discovery.text: But only 15% of work friendships survive a job change. Most are proximity-based, not values-based.

twist.text: The pandemic revealed which work friends were real. Without the office, many connections simply evaporated.
